Introducing IBM DataPower Gateways
A Powerhouse for DataPower and Gateway Appliances
Miracle Software Systems, Inc. is a global systems integrator with 20 years of proven experience. We are Premium business partners & Software re-sellers of IBM. Miracle works closely with you to provide an accelerated installation of the DataPower appliances. We will provide enablement services to your technical teams and conduct a review of the roles and responsibilities required to maintain a DataPower solution. Won IBM SOA Cost Optimization Award in IMPACT 2009 and IBM SMART SOA Award in IMPACT 2011 for various integration services provided to IBM customers.

IBM Datapower Gateways
 
  • Low startup cost

Differentiators
 
  • Miracle Enterprise Monitoring Framework for end-to-end transaction monitoring
  • Accelerators on Logging and Monitoring, Service Orchestration, MQ based use cases
  • Re-usable Security framework that can support REST/SOAP based calls
  • Large Message Processing Handling Accelerators using MTOM/SOAP with attachment techniques
  • Automated Deployment scripts using DCM/ANT/SOMA scripts from Development to SIT to Performance and Production environments
  • Maintenance scripts for enabling objects, start/stop Front side handlers, Deployment Policies
  • Accelerator frameworks to deploy OAUTH, SAML, JWT, REST security patterns
  • WTS Token Generation techniques and automated scripts
  • Accelerators for Hybrid Integration using DataPower Secure Gateway to BlueMix Applications

  • Service discovery and assessment and recommended best practices
  • End-to-End implementation of one business use case
